mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.gsss as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.px as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED5' as ORGTYPE, '组织结构' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.ssou as OUID, t1.porgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.btqy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorg t1) t1 WHERE (t1.PORGID = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid')} and t1.STARTSTOPSIGN ='1')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED6' as ORGTYPE, '部门' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO, t1.porgsectorid as PORGSECTORID FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED6' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED7' as ORGTYPE, '项目部' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO, t1.porgsectorid as PORGSECTORID FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='20' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED9' as ORGTYPE, '领导班子' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO, t1.porgsectorid as PORGSECTORID FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED9') t1 WHERE (t1.PORGID = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid')} and t1.STARTSTOPSIGN ='1' and ( t1.PORGSECTORID is null ))

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.gsss as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.px as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED5' as ORGTYPE, '组织结构' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.ssou as OUID, t1.porgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.btqy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorg t1 UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED6' as ORGTYPE, '部门' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED6' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED7' as ORGTYPE, '项目部' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='20' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED9' as ORGTYPE, '领导班子' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED9') t1 WHERE ((t1.ORMORGINFOID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} and t1.STARTSTOPSIGN ='1') OR (t1.porgid is null and t1.ORMORGINFOID<>'DEFAULT' and 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')})))

SELECT t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ORDERNUM`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORGTYPENAME`, t1.`ORMERPORGID`, t1.`ORMORGINFOID`, t1.`ORMORGINFONAME`, t1.`OUID`, t1.`PORGID`, t11.`ORMORGINFONAME` AS `PORGNAME`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SUBSTANDARD`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_ORMORGINFO` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMORGINFO t11 ON t1.PORGID = t11.ORMORGINFOID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.gsss as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.px as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED5' as ORGTYPE, '组织结构' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.porgid as ORMERPORGID, t1.orgid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.ssou as OUID, t1.porgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.btqy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN FROM v_ormorg t1 UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED6' as ORGTYPE, '部门' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgid as ORMERPORGID, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN FROM v_ormorgsector t1) t1

SELECT t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ORDERNUM`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORGTYPENAME`, t1.`ORMORGINFOID`, t1.`ORMORGINFONAME`, t1.`OUID`, t1.`PORGID`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t1.`POSTINFO`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`SUBSTANDARD`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_ORMORGINFO` t1

SELECT t1.BELONGREGION, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERNUM, t1.ORGCODE, t1.ORGTYPE, t1.ORGTYPENAME, t1.ORMORGINFOID, t1.ORMORGINFONAME, t1.OUID, t1.PORGID, t1.PORGSECTORID, t1.POSTINFO, t1.SHORTNAME, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN, t1.SUBSTANDARD, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_ORMORGINFO t1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.gsss as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.px as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED5' as ORGTYPE, '组织结构' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.ssou as OUID, t1.porgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.btqy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorg t1 UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED6' as ORGTYPE, '部门' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED6' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED7' as ORGTYPE, '项目部' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='20' UNION SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED9' as ORGTYPE, '领导班子' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED9' ) t1 WHERE ( t1.PORGID = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid')} )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.BELONGREGION as BELONGREGION, t1.createdate as CREATEDATE, t1.createman as CREATEMAN, t1.ORDERVALUE as ORDERNUM, t1.orgcode as ORGCODE, 'CCEED6' as ORGTYPE, '部门' as ORGTYPENAME, t1.orgsectorid as ORMORGINFOID, t1.orgsectorname as ORMORGINFONAME, t1.BELONGOU as OUID, t1.orgid as PORGID, '' AS PORGNAME, t1.SHORTNAME as SHORTNAME, t1.qy as SUBSTANDARD, t1.updatedate as UPDATEDATE, t1.updatedate as UPDATEMAN, t1.STARTSTOPSIGN as STARTSTOPSIGN, '' as POSTINFO, t1.porgsectorid as PORGSECTORID FROM v_ormorgsector t1 where t1.bmlx='10' and t1.orgtype='CCEED6' ) t1 WHERE (t1.PORGSECTORID = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid')} and t1.STARTSTOPSIGN ='1')
SELECT * FROM V_ORGINFO t1 WHERE ( t1.PORGID = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid')} or t1.PORGID in (select a.orgsectorid from v_ormorgsector a where a.porgsectorid=#{srf.webcontext.nodeid')} ) )
